revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Tin Tower |image = [[File:Tin Tower.png]] |caption = A map of Tin Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northeast of Ecruteak City. }} '''Tin Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 88,500 |- | Raticate (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Haunter (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Ho-oh (Boss) || 610,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Rattata * Gastly * Raticate (boss) * Haunter (boss) * Ho-oh (boss) *Requires Suicune, Raikou, and Entei, the Johto [[Roaming Pokémon|roaming pokémon]]
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Item Magnet}} [[Item Magnet]] || 33% |}
